title: Promoting water-splitting reaction on TiO2/gCN with Pd/SrO cocatalysts: H2 evolution in the absence of a sacrificial reagent
content:
Energy Adv., 2024, 3,983-996
DOI: 10.1039/D4YA00045E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Khezina Rafiq, Kashaf Ul Sahar, Muhammad Zeeshan Abid, Saira Attique, Ubaid ur Rehman, Abdul Rauf, Ejaz Hussain
This study investigates Pd–SrO@TiO2/gCN photocatalysts for eco-friendly H2 generation through water splitting.
